description: Describes  a Gaussian density profile, meaning exp(gasFactor * pow(abs((y - gasCenter_SI) / gasSigma_SI), gasPower)) for front and rear of the profile and constant in between

gasCenterLeft.description: The central position of the left part of the gas distribution in meters

gasCenterRight.description: The central position of the right part of the gas distribution in meters

gasSigmaLeft.description: The distance from gasCenterLeft until the gas density decreases to its 1/e-th part in meters

gasSigmaRight.description: The distance from gasCenterRight until the gas density decreases to its 1/e-th part in meters

vacuumCellsY.description: Because of the laser initialization which is done in the first cells of the simulation and assumes a charge-free volume
